graphql.query:
query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	searchEngineGetCollections (query: $query)
	{
		id
		name
		documentsNumber
		defaultSortingField
		numMemoryShards
		timestampCreatedAt
		isEnableNestedFields
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	searchEngineFindCollection (query: $query)
	{
		id
		name
		documentsNumber
		defaultSortingField
		numMemoryShards
		timestampCreatedAt
		isEnableNestedFields
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($id:ID)
{
	searchEngineFindCollectionById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		name
		documentsNumber
		defaultSortingField
		numMemoryShards
		timestampCreatedAt
		isEnableNestedFields
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($payload:SearchEngineUpdateCollectionInput!)
{
	searchEngineUpdateCollection (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		name
		documentsNumber
		defaultSortingField
		numMemoryShards
		timestampCreatedAt
		isEnableNestedFields
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($id:ID!)
{
	searchEngineDeleteCollectionById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		name
		documentsNumber
		defaultSortingField
		numMemoryShards
		timestampCreatedAt
		isEnableNestedFields
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	searchEngineDeleteCollections (query: $query)
	{
		id
		name
		documentsNumber
		defaultSortingField
		numMemoryShards
		timestampCreatedAt
		isEnableNestedFields
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}
